description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Go retro in this arcade action title with unique gameplay and visual style.  The 80s super computer is printing an ASCII army and it's up to you to pilot the ASCII assault vehicle to put an end to the mayhem.  Updated enemies, levels, and modes await you in this challenging game with retro controls and ASCII kicking style.
